newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Taiwan tenders to buy May 16-31/Jun 1-15 reformate.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan tenders to buy May 16-31/Jun 1-15 reformate.

text.p: Taiwan's state-owned Chinese Petroleum Corp (CPC) has issued a tender to buy leaded and unleaded 95-octane reformate for delivery in May and June, a company official said on Monday.

The tender, which closes April 21 and is valid for two days, seeks a 250,000-barrel cargo of unleaded reformate for delivery in May 16-31 and/or June 1-15 and a 250,000-barrel cargo of leaded reformate for June 1-15 arrival.
CPC seeks offers on a coast-and-freight (c-and-f) basis to Keelung, Taichung, Kaohsiung or Shalung.

In its last tender for its May 1-15 requirements, CPC bought two unleaded cargoes at $27.40 per barrel, c-and-f, from South Korean refiner Yukong and Dutch trader Vitol, and an leaded cargo from Swiss trader Glencore at $27.70.
